name: Gerbreg
desc: Gerbreg is a simple town, barely supporting more than thirty people, but it has been hit the hardest by Malthusius's clouds. They have no big fancy farms, or a tavern, nor any great reward to provide heros that defeat Malthusius, but they have a strength of will to survive under Malthusius's thumb. These hardy people have toiled in the fields for only 88.6% yield. In this small town, they have a bulletin board which only has a few posters on it, the most visible is a desperate plea for adventurers to fight against Malthusius and stop the cloud cover reducing crop yield.
